
{{alias}}( x, α, β )
    Evaluates the cumulative distribution function (CDF) for a beta distribution
    with first shape parameter `α` and second shape parameter `β` at a
    value `x`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        Input value.

    α: number
        First shape parameter.

    β: number
        Second shape parameter.

    Returns
    -------
    out: double
        Evaluated CDF.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( 0.5, 1.0, 1.0 )
    0.5
    > y = {{alias}}( 0.5, 2.0, 4.0 )
    ~0.813
    > y = {{alias}}( 0.2, 2.0, 2.0 )
    ~0.104
    > y = {{alias}}( 0.8, 4.0, 4.0 )
    ~0.967
    > y = {{alias}}( -0.5, 4.0, 2.0 )
    0.0
    > y = {{alias}}( 1.5, 4.0, 2.0 )
    1.0


{{alias}}.factory( α, β )
    Returns a function for evaluating the cumulative distribution function (CDF)
    for a beta distribution with first shape parameter `α` and second shape
    parameter `β`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    α: number
        First shape parameter.

    β: number
        Second shape parameter.

    Returns
    -------
    cdf: Function
        Cumulative distribution function (CDF).

    Examples
    --------
    > var mycdf = {{alias}}.factory( 0.5, 0.5 );
    > var y = mycdf( 0.8 )
    ~0.705
    > y = mycdf( 0.3 )
    ~0.369

    See Also
    --------
